The '''Snow-Covered Path''' is a subarea in the north-east part of [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

===Exploration===
*[[Ancient Rime]]
*[[Frostbearing Tree]]
*[[Scarlet Quartz]]
*[[Warming Seelie]]
